If your GOVERNMENT goes around installing toilets so you don't ALL die of famine, then nobody uses them - then maybe, just MAYBE that shit isn't fucking "normal".

Greatest rates in the WORLD of violent rape per capita isn't normal mother fucker. (and it's saying something beating out the immigrants in Europe right now, that's hard to do)

Religion fueled brawls consisting of people with swords and spears is NOT normal in this day and age mother fucker.

It being not only legal, but even frequent and often praised, the marriage of cousins or brother/sister - THAT'S NOT FUCKING NORMAL!

Not saying you shouldn't do any of those things - to each their own; but that shit isn't "normal", and you can't play the race card on people who call it out.
